alert.note: Alert for Greeley; Nance; Valley (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 9:48PM CDT until September 07 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Greeley County in central Nebraska... Western Nance County in central Nebraska... Northeastern Valley County in central Nebraska... * Until 1030 PM CDT. * At 948 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ord, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Automated Weather Station reported over 70 MPH winds in Ord. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Greeley. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
